1111110011110000
0010110000000000 //MOVI REG12 1111000000000000

0010010010111011 //MOVI REG4 .check_shoot_player2
0100000011000100 //JCND NC REG4
1111000000001111

0100000100000000 //LOAD REG1 REG0

0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0

0100101101001100

1101001100001111 //MOVI REG3 00001111
1101010000001111 //MOVI REG4 00001111
1111010100001111
0010010111110000 //MOVI REG5 0000111111110000
1111100000010001
0010100000011011 //MOVI REG8 0001000100011011
1111100100000011
0010100110101001 //MOVI REG9 .return_check_wall_collision
1101110100000000 //MOVI REG13 00000000
0000010110111000 //CMP REG5 REG8
0100011111001001 //JCND GT REG9
0100110100000101 //LOAD REG13 REG5
1111100000000011
0010100010110000 //MOVI REG8 .increment
1111100100000011
0010100110111011 //MOVI REG9 .check_collision
1000110101001110 //LSH REG13 1110
1011110100000110 //CMPI REG13 00000110
0100110111001000 //JCND LT REG8
0100101110001001 //JAL REG11 REG9
1111100000000011
0010100010110000 //MOVI REG8 .increment
1011110100000000 //CMPI REG13 00000000
0100000111001000 //JCND EQ REG8
0101110000000001
0100101100001100 //POP REG11
0101110000000001
0100011000001100 //POP REG6
0101110000000001
0100010100001100 //POP REG5
0100000011001011 //JCND NC REG11
0101010100000001 //ADDI REG5 00000001
0101001100100000 //ADDI REG3 00100000
1111100000000010
0010100001111111 //MOVI REG8 0000001001111111
1111100100000011
0010100110010101 //MOVI REG9 .next_tile
0000001110111000 //CMP REG3 REG8
0100110111001001 //JCND LT REG9
1101001100001111 //MOVI REG3 00001111
0101010000100000 //ADDI REG4 00100000
0100000011001001 //JCND NC REG9
1111110100000011
0010110111001000 //MOVI REG13 .reverse_x
0000111010110011 //CMP REG14 REG3
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
0000100011011110 //MOV REG8 REG14
0000100010010011 //SUB REG8 REG3
1111110100000011
0010110111010001 //MOVI REG13 .check_y
1011100000100000 //CMPI REG8 00100000
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
1111110100000011
0010110111100111 //MOVI REG13 .return_false
0100000011001101 //JCND NC REG13
0000100011010011 //MOV REG8 REG3
0000100010011110 //SUB REG8 REG14
1111110100000011
0010110111010001 //MOVI REG13 .check_y
1011100000100000 //CMPI REG8 00100000
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
1111110100000011
0010110111100111 //MOVI REG13 .return_false
0100000011001101 //JCND NC REG13
1111110100000011
0010110111011110 //MOVI REG13 .reverse_y
0000111110110100 //CMP REG15 REG4
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
0000100011011111 //MOV REG8 REG15
0000100010010100 //SUB REG8 REG4
1111110100000011
0010110111101001 //MOVI REG13 .return_true
1011100000100000 //CMPI REG8 00100000
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
1111110100000011
0010110111100111 //MOVI REG13 .return_false
0100000011001101 //JCND NC REG13
0000100011010100 //MOV REG8 REG4
0000100010011111 //SUB REG8 REG15
1111110100000011
0010110111101001 //MOVI REG13 .return_true
1011100000100000 //CMPI REG8 00100000
0100110111001101 //JCND LT REG13
1111110100000011
0010110111100111 //MOVI REG13 .return_false
0100000011001101 //JCND NC REG13
1101110100000000 //MOVI REG13 00000000
0100000011001011 //JCND NC REG11
1101110100000001 //MOVI REG13 00000001
0100000011001011 //JCND NC REG11
1111000011110000
0010000000000001 //MOVI REG0 1111000000000001
0100010000000000 //LOAD REG4 REG0
0101010000000001 //ADDI REG4 00000001
0100010001000000 //STOR REG4 REG0
0000000011010100 //MOV REG0 REG4
0001000000000011 //ANDI REG0 00000011
1011000000000000 //CMPI REG0 00000000
1100001000001010 //BCND NE 00001010
1111000000001111
0010000000010000 //MOVI REG0 0000111100010000
0100000100000000 //LOAD REG1 REG0
0001000100001101 //ANDI REG1 00001101
0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0
1111000000001111
0010000000010001 //MOVI REG0 0000111100010001
0100000100000000 //LOAD REG1 REG0
0001000100001101 //ANDI REG1 00001101
0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0
0000000011010100 //MOV REG0 REG4
0001000000000001 //ANDI REG0 00000001
1011000000000000 //CMPI REG0 00000000
1100001000010110 //BCND NE 00010110
1111000000010001
0010000000100001 //MOVI REG0 0001000100100001
0100000100000000 //LOAD REG1 REG0
1011000100000100 //CMPI REG1 00000100
1100001000000100 //BCND NE 00000100 // Skip to incrementing the frame id
1111001000010001
0010001000100000 //MOVI REG2 0001000100100000
1101001100000000 //MOVI REG3 00000000
0100001101000010 //STOR REG3 REG2
0101000100000001 //ADDI REG1 00000001
0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0
1111000000010001
0010000000011110 //MOVI REG0 0001000100011110
0100000100000000 //LOAD REG1 REG0
1011000100000100 //CMPI REG1 00000100
1100001000000100 //BCND NE 00000100 // Skip to incrementing the frame id
1111001000010001
0010001000011101 //MOVI REG2 0001000100011101
1101001100000000 //MOVI REG3 00000000
0100001101000010 //STOR REG3 REG2
0101000100000001 //ADDI REG1 00000001
0100000101000000 //STOR REG1 REG0
0100000011001011 //JCND NC REG11
0101110000000001
0100000000001100 //POP REG0 // start of string to write
1111000100010001
0010000100100011 //MOVI REG1 0001000100100011 // font map location
1111001000010001
0010001000100010 //MOVI REG2 0001000100100010 // font scale location
0100001000000010 //LOAD REG2 REG2
0000001111011111 //MOV REG3 REG15
0000010011011111 //MOV REG4 REG15
1000001101000110 //LSH REG3 0110 // pos_y * 64
1000010001000100 //LSH REG4 0100 // pos_y * 14
0000000101010011 //ADD REG1 REG3
0000000101010100 //ADD REG1 REG4
0000000101011110 //ADD REG1 REG14
1101001100000001 //MOVI REG3 00000001
1011001000000000 //CMPI REG2 00000000
1100000100000011 //BCND EQ 00000011
1000001101000001 //LSH REG3 0001
1001001000000001 //SUBI REG2 00000001
1100000011111011 //BCND NC 11111011
0000001011010011 //MOV REG2 REG3
0100001100000000 //LOAD REG3 REG0
1011001100000000 //CMPI REG3 00000000
1100000100000100 //BCND EQ 00000100 // jump to end if a null terminator
0100001101000001 //STOR REG3 REG1
0000000101010010 //ADD REG1 REG2
0101000000000001 //ADDI REG0 00000001
1100000011111001 //BCND NC 11111001
0100000011001011 //JCND NC REG11
1111000000010001
0010000000100011 //MOVI REG0 0001000100100011 // font map location
1111000100100011
0010000111100010 //MOVI REG1 0010001111100010 // end of font map location
1101001000000000 //MOVI REG2 00000000
0000000010110001 //CMP REG0 REG1
0100000111001011 //JCND EQ REG11 // returns if they are equal
0100001001000000 //STOR REG2 REG0
0101000000000001 //ADDI REG0 00000001
1100000011111011 //BCND NC 11111011
0100101101001100
1001110000000001 //PUSH REG11
1111000000100011
0010000011100011 //MOVI REG0 0010001111100011 // string we will use
1111000100001110
0010000101110100 //MOVI REG1 0000111001110100 // player1 health
0100000100000001 //LOAD REG1 REG1
1111001100010001
0010001100100010 //MOVI REG3 0001000100100010
1101010000000001 //MOVI REG4 00000001
0100010001000011 //STOR REG4 REG3
1111001100000011
0010001111010000 //MOVI REG3 0000001111010000 // P
0100001101000000 //STOR REG3 REG0
0101000000000001 //ADDI REG0 00000001
1111001100000011

0100001101000000 //STOR REG3 REG0
0101000000000001 //ADDI REG0 00000001
1111001100000011
0010001110111010 //MOVI REG3 0000001110111010 // :
0100001101000000 //STOR REG3 REG0

0100001101000000 //STOR REG3 REG0
0101000000000001 //ADDI REG0 00000001
1111001100011100

0100001101000000 //STOR REG3 REG0
